name: rss-reader
title: RSS Reader
description: Browse latest news from your favourite sources
author: fuksman

commands.name: feeds
commands.title: View Subscriptions
commands.subtitle: RSS
commands.description: Manage your favourite sources and read stories

commands.name: stories
commands.title: Read All Stories
commands.subtitle: RSS
commands.description: Get the latest from all your favourite sources at once

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
